title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Regular>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>><<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aig, I wanted to talk to you for a second.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
S-sure. What's up?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
To be quite blunt, Aig, I'm not sure where you fit in this band.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Angry>>
What do you mean?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
How do I put this.
When a fan looks at a Boy Band, they like to see strong, indetifiable personalities that are easy to connect with.
For instance, Jaypee is an unpredictable but charasmatic hearthrob with a bit of a wild side.
And Lee is the strong, sensitive leader who truly cares about the music.
Boom. Those right there are two big personalities that are easy to pick out of a line up.
But when I look at you, I don't see anything in particular. 
To me, you're just...I don't know.  Some guy.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Just...some guy?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Exactly! You're...how do I put this...
You're handsome, but you're not gorgeous. 
You're talented, but you're not a prodigy.
You're funny, but you're not hilarious.
You're nice, but you're not Ghandi.
Do you see what I'm saying?
->Yeah.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah...I think so.
->Am I cute?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Well..am I cute?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    Uh...
    Well, yeah...
    But you're not adorable.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    Oh...
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Look, Aig, you were able to coast through the Academy on you're mediocrity, but your career will die in the cradle if you don't start carving out a niche for yourself.
I want you to really focus on making yourself stand out.
If you want to succeed in this industry, you can't get away with being just a person any more. You have to be a personALITY. You get me?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
Y-yeah. I get you.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Good! 
<<flip Kent>>
Now get back to work.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yes, ma'am!
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>><<move Aig CenterStage>>
...
<<expression Aig Angry>>
...Jesus.
